items.title: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated Investor News: UNH Investors Are Encouraged to Contact The Rosen Law Firm About Ongoing Investigation of Breaches of Fiduciary Duties by the Directors and Officers â€“ UNH
items.author: Rosen Law Firm
items.description: The Rosen Law Firm is investigating potential breaches of fiduciary duties by the directors and officers of UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (UNH) in connection with a report of an investigation by the United States Department of Justice into UnitedHealth's billing practices.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article indicates that the Rosen Law Firm is investigating potential breaches of fiduciary duties by UnitedHealth's directors and officers, which suggests potential wrongdoing or mismanagement within the company.
